Line 27: Line 27:
It can be played by a single player, through a [[local area network]] (LAN), or through the Internet via Ysagoon Online Game (YOG), a meta-server. It also features [[artificial intelligence|AI]] for playing with computer teams, a scripting language for versatile gameplay or tutorials and an integrated map editor.
It can be played by a single player, through a [[local area network]] (LAN), or through the Internet via Ysagoon Online Game (YOG), a meta-server. It also features [[artificial intelligence|AI]] for playing with computer teams, a scripting language for versatile gameplay or tutorials and an integrated map editor.

''Globulation 2'' is a multi-platform (Linux distributions, BSD Unix, GNU Hurd, Apple MacÂ OS, Microsoft Windows, etc) free software package (released under the [[GNU General Public License]] version 3), included in several major open source operating system distributions such as [[Debian]]<ref>[http://packages.debian.org/testing/games/glob2 Debian - Details of package glob2 in lenny<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> and [[Ubuntu (Linux distribution)|Ubuntu]]<ref>[http://packages.ubuntu.com/feisty/games/glob2 Ubuntu - glob2<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> and is rated 5 stars (out of 5) on Linux Game Tome.<ref>[http://www.happypenguin.org/show?Globulation%202 The Linux Game Tome: Globulation 2<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>

''Globulation 2'' is a multi-platform (Linux distributions, BSD Unix, GNU Hurd, Apple Mac OS, Microsoft Windows, etc) free software package (released under the [[GNU General Public License]] version 3), included in several major open source operating system distributions such as [[Debian]]<ref>[http://packages.debian.org/testing/games/glob2 Debian - Details of package glob2 in lenny<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> and [[Ubuntu (operating system)|Ubuntu]]<ref>[http://packages.ubuntu.com/feisty/games/glob2 Ubuntu - glob2<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> and is rated 5 stars (out of 5) on Linux Game Tome.<ref>[http://www.happypenguin.org/show?Globulation%202 The Linux Game Tome: Globulation 2<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
